ComicInfo.Summary: Unhinged, Finale: Revelations: The bloody, ragged remains of the Secret Six fight their way through throngs of Gotham City heroes and villains, and the mystery person behind the whole affair is revealed.
ComicInfo.Title: Unhinged, Finale: Revelations
